title: FSH 1909-1911 T206 Huggins Portrait autographed with full COA
author: Republicaninmass

posts.post_title: FSH 1909-1911 T206 Huggins Portrait autographed with full COA
posts.post_content:
Edited: Something came up I'd really like so I'm now asking 17.5k/BO

Once in a lifetime shot at this card signed

Listening to offers

Full COA from Richard Simon


[IMG]https://photos.smugmug.com/Other-cards/i-357V4C5/0/M/t206huggins088-M.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]https://photos.smugmug.com/Other-cards/i-5Hn9sKN/0/M/t206huggins089-M.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for the kinds words Scott.  Still taking offers on what is probably the toughest possible HOF auto in the set.



[IMG]https://photos.smugmug.com/Other-cards/i-W6rHn3H/0/M/huggins_coA091-M.jpg[/IMG]

TTT 

asking price added

Will trade/partial for tough signed cards, particularly 1952 topps

[quote name="Republicaninmass" post=1626011]TTT 

asking price added

Will trade/partial for tough signed cards, particularly 1952 topps[/QUOTE]

Is the asking price 20,000 United States dollars or a different currency?
$20k is probably a pretty decent price considering the guy died in the 20's. I'd be surprised if another signed t206 even existed.
Great card. Didn't realize how rare his autograph was. Good luck with the sale.

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1626094]$20k is probably a pretty decent price considering the guy died in the 20's. I'd be surprised if another signed t206 even existed.[/QUOTE]

I know there is at least one fake one and one is probably wanted badly by someone should it be real, however, I was not asking for confirmation that the price was realistic. I was asking for clarification if I understand the asking price.

With most things I suspect there are a few more than you would expect should it be real.

So you're asking if Ted is selling this for $20,000?  Or 20,000 Pesos?  Or 20,000 Euros?  Do we really have an issue with the currency in use on this board?  I've always paid in US dollars and been good with the sellers.  I'd just go with that as the default if you see anything in the BST...

Cheers,
Geno

[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1626181]I know there is at least one fake one[/QUOTE]
 

Good for you
[quote name="PhillipAbbott79" post=1626181

 I was asking for clarification if I understand the asking price[/QUOTE]

Why dont you make an offer since you pm'd me last week about it?


...or stop pissing in the thread, its against the very few  rules

That is correct. I had attempted to see what sort of range you were requesting for the card. You had provided me with a very high and wide range that I was incapable of working with, which I concluded was half sarcasm.

I saw this and then I started to believe that maybe I misunderstood the currency. There are certainly people overseas and many people in Canada on this forum.

I wasn't attempting to piss on your thread. I simply asked a question for clarification. Either way, there is simply no way we can make a deal now, regardless of what the price is. Good luck with your sale.

only seen one other signed by Huggins:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=172808&highlight=elliott[/url]
wow Ted what an amazing card!!!
I realize it is not in a fancy holder, and I will accpet offers accordingly
May I ask why you don't get it graded? Great card, and good luck on the sale!
